title: Consolidated sales of L'Oréal worldwide 2009 to 2018
summary: In general Sales in million euros has rose over the Year.
Sales in million euros is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2011, and lastly slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Sales in million euros, of value 21638.0 was reached at Year 2012
The lowest Sales in million euros, of value 17473.0 was reported at Year 2009
